translations: n.<正式>给予惩罚的人；宿敌，死对头；报应，天罚

sentences.sentence: The new mathematics test will become the nemesis of teachers.
sentences.translation: 新的数学测试将会是对老师们的严重惩罚。

sentences.sentence: Sun Microsystems gave up its legal fight with Microsoft and agreed to cooperate with its longtime nemesis.
sentences.translation: 太阳微系统放弃了和微软的官司，与这家自己竞争了多年的主要对手携手合作。

sentences.sentence: In 1938, the Cantabs suffered only one loss, and a first title, defeating former nemesis.
sentences.translation: 1938年，坎塔布斯队只输了一场，并且获得了第一个冠军，击败了前强硬对手。
